commit.message:
Add array.array to array, bytearray to bytes and write_int improvement (#455)

* write python array to array

* write bytearray to bytes

* add timeit-based benchmarks

* small speed-improvement for write_int

* change array.array test typecode for compatibility with python 2.7

* fname for write_python_array to fix merge

* test int encoding

* explicit type for write_int

* "for item in datum" in write_python_array

* add benchmarks and compare encoding with avro

* use specific typename long64 for write_int

* use pytest.mark.parametrize for test_int_binary;
also test read_int

Co-authored-by: scottbelden <scottabelden@gmail.com>

commit.message: more formatting tweaks
formatting tweaks
newer mac versions are being built
logical values should not be allowed in validation since they should have already been converted to the base type
fix bug where load schema was creating unions of unions
add hint to top level union schemas

Convert iterables to list in cython array writing (#441)

* Convert iterables to list in cython array writing

In particular, I was trying to write tuples as arrays (the closest avro
type).

* Test for tuple encoding

* Fix whitespace style

commit.message:
Add type stubs (#438)

* Add type stubs for read APIs

* Add type stubs for write APIs

* Add type stubs for validation APIs

* Add type stubs for schema APIs

* Add block_reader, remove file_reader from read pyi

Add the block_reader and its partner Block to the type stub
for the read module.

On the way, remove file_reader because it's not in the exported
public API, and it has an ambiguous (or at least complicated)
type for its __iter__, next, and __next__ methods; their return
value types depend upon the concrete subclass.

* Add a py.typed sentinel file for mypy support

As laid out in [0], a specially-named py.typed file is needed to get
mypy support for distributed packages.

[0]: https://github.com/python/mypy/blob/92e3f396b03c69c1d8abc249632bfd2db02350d0/docs/source/installed_packages.rst#making-pep-561-compatible-packages

* Obey flake8 regarding comment spacing

* Include type stubs and sentinel file in distribution

* Add mypy to automated tests

* Skip running mypy on Python 2

* Only install mypy on Python 3+

* Don't run mypy on pypy because it can't be installed

See https://github.com/python/typed_ast/issues/111 for more.

* Fix multiline inline python command

* some day i will learn to bash

verification.payload:
tree a5d2a12257fc0d6c4f74a322df0aaffe111db651
parent 0aa6b0f58ebbcb6f280f6e6362b1dd166d1fe507
author Spencer Nelson <s@spencerwnelson.com> 1592840988 -0700
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1592840988 -0400

Add type stubs (#438)

* Add type stubs for read APIs

* Add type stubs for write APIs

* Add type stubs for validation APIs

* Add type stubs for schema APIs

* Add block_reader, remove file_reader from read pyi

Add the block_reader and its partner Block to the type stub
for the read module.

On the way, remove file_reader because it's not in the exported
public API, and it has an ambiguous (or at least complicated)
type for its __iter__, next, and __next__ methods; their return
value types depend upon the concrete subclass.

* Add a py.typed sentinel file for mypy support

As laid out in [0], a specially-named py.typed file is needed to get
mypy support for distributed packages.

[0]: https://github.com/python/mypy/blob/92e3f396b03c69c1d8abc249632bfd2db02350d0/docs/source/installed_packages.rst#making-pep-561-compatible-packages

* Obey flake8 regarding comment spacing

* Include type stubs and sentinel file in distribution

* Add mypy to automated tests

* Skip running mypy on Python 2

* Only install mypy on Python 3+

* Don't run mypy on pypy because it can't be installed

See https://github.com/python/typed_ast/issues/111 for more.

* Fix multiline inline python command

* some day i will learn to bash
